title: FNF Lebanon & Syria
subtitle: According to the #UNHCR there are 914,648 registered #refugees all over #Lebanon. They are divided as following: 26.5% of them are registered in #North Lebanon, 24.5% are registered in #Beirut, 11.4% in #South Lebanon and 37.6% in the #Bekaa area #InfoMondaypic.twitter.com/S6XDOAIewS
